Package golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.persistence.adapter

Class MovieRepositoryAdapter

java.lang.Object
golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.persistence.adapter.MovieRepositoryAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovieQueryPort, MovieRepositoryPort, SaveMovieWithIdPort
@Component public class MovieRepositoryAdapter extends Object implements MovieRepositoryPort, SaveMovieWithIdPort, MovieQueryPort
Output Adapter for movie persistence operations. Implements MovieRepositoryPort, SaveMovieWithIdPort, and MovieQueryPort.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Luiz Generoso
